validation.url: Enter a web address with a complete URL, like https://example.org

locale.label: Language

user.label: Username
user.error: Username must be between 1 and 38 characters long.

repo.error: Repository name must only include letters, numbers and hyphens.

token.error: Personal access token must be an alphanumeric value that is 40 characters long.

me.label: Address
me.hint: For example, https://mywebsite.example. To change this value, sign out and sign back in with the address you want to use.
